description: Learn how to make beef ragu from scratch. Using a slow cooker, this recipe makes a delicious, hearty pasta sauce with super tender meat.
name: Slow Cooker Beef Ragu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta to slow cooker, gently stirring into ragu to combine. Cook on low for 3 minutes or until pasta is tender. Divide ragu mixture among bowls.
